Definition in file GNAT.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum PROGRAM_MODE
 

PROGRAM_MODE.

Description: This enumeration is used to determine which mode the program is currently in. It is also used when saving and loading files to determine what type of file it is.

Limitations: None

Enumerator:
MODE_UNDEFINED  This is the default mode.
MODE_PUZZLE  This is used to indicate the puzzle mode.
MODE_TREE  This is used to indicate the tree mode.
MODE_CHANCE  This is used to indicate the chance tree mode.

Definition at line 44 of file GNAT.h.

Variable Documentation

const quint32 SAVEFILE_MAGICNUM
 

This const is used to indicate that a file is usable by this program.

The first 4 bytes of a file must match this number to be loaded into the GNAT program.
